name: Nameless Rainbow Game - alpha demo 0.3.2
description:
N.R.G. is in very early development, I've been working on it for 6 months so far, and this is my first public release, version 0.3.

The concept of this game was heavily inspired by Vlambeers' Super Crate Box, so if you're into that hopefully you'll enjoy this.

I have many ideas of directions this game can go in, but since I am doing the animations, sound effects, music, coding & PR, I want to see what you guys think before I crack on!

Now I want feedback, loads of it, I'd like to get a community together ideally to help sculpt the Sloepix Multiverse as I work on each of my games and each of the characters involved.. N.R.G. is only the beginning, who knows how far this can go (:

Thanks, and Enjoy!

Jack

Check out https://twitter.com/sloepix for progress updates!
